name: John F. Kennedy University
academic_year: January to December (January-March; April-June; July-September; October-December). Also Summer session (June-August). Law School: August to May (August-December; January-May). Summer session (June-August)
accrediting_agency: Western Association of Schools and Colleges; International Assembly For Collegiate Business Education; American Psychological Association Committee of Bar Examiners of the State Bar of California
